original_text: These are more of Solomon's proverbs. Hezekiah's men wrote them down when Hezekiah was king of Judah.
korean_text: 이것도 솔로몬의 잠언이요 유다 왕 히스기야의 신하들이 편집한 것이니라

sentences.original_text: These are more of Solomon's proverbs
sentences.korean_translation: 이것들은 솔로몬의 잠언들 중 더 많은 것입니다

sentences.original_text: when Hezekiah was king of Judah
